# Introduction

This package is used to help people interested in data analysis to get a basic understanding of how it could work. The package is composed of data from Swedens four biggest municipalities; Stockholm, Uppsala, Malmö, and Göteborg. This data is collected via the Kolada API. The data analysis is a stepwize journey for the user to follow along and try to draw their own conclusions regarding what the data says.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
library(BaDaAn)




```
